p: The crude methanolic extract of the plant parts of Diospyros mespiliformis has an LD 50 â‰¥ 5 g/kg following oral administration in rats, thus safe based on the OECD standards. In the sub-chronic toxicity studies, the leaf and bark ethyl acetate fractions of the plant were relatively safe (P > 0.05). Further therapeutics studies are suggested to ascertain the extensive traditional use of the plant.
